gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Layouts
Interface IComponentSwapper

All Superinterfaces:
IPreserveState
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractComponentSwapper, ComponentSwapper2D
public interface IComponentSwapper
extends IPreserveState

This interface defines methods for classes which group similar IViewComponents into one view. Classes implementing this interface will arrange the IViewComponent and its controls onto a single panel.

See Also:
IViewComponent, IVirtualArray

See Also:
Constant Field Values

total_views

static final java.lang.String[] total_views
List of all available views for any ComponentSwapper. If a view is added, it should be added to this list.

SHOW_ALL

static final int SHOW_ALL
0 - This variable is a ViewControl display scheme for any given ComponentSwapper. This option specifies all controls to be shown. Use this value as a parameter where display_scheme is needed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SHOW_NONE

static final int SHOW_NONE
1 - This variable is a ViewControl display scheme for any given ComponentSwapper. This option specifies all controls to be hidden. Use this value as a parameter where display_scheme is needed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SHOW_DEFAULT

static final int SHOW_DEFAULT
2 - This variable is a ViewControl display scheme for any given ComponentSwapper. This option specifies controls to be shown according to IComponentSwapper internal defaults. Use this value as a parameter where display_scheme is needed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

USER_DEFINED

static final int USER_DEFINED
3 - This variable is a ViewControl display scheme for any given ComponentSwapper. This option specifies controls to be shown according to indices passed in via setVisibleControls(int,int[]). Use this value as a parameter where display_scheme is needed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Method Detail

getViewTypes

java.lang.String[] getViewTypes()
Get all available IViewComponent types displayable by this swapper. Types are specified by int keys defined by the IComponentSwapper interface.

Returns:
List of available IViewComponent types that can be displayed by this swapper.

getVisibleViewType

java.lang.String getVisibleViewType()
Get the currently visible IViewComponent type displayed by this swapper. Types are specified by int keys defined by the IComponentSwapper interface.

Returns:
Current IViewComponent type that is being displayed by this swapper.

setVisibleViewType

void setVisibleViewType(java.lang.String view_type)
Set the currently visible IViewComponent type displayed by this swapper. Types are specified by String keys defined by the IComponentSwapper interface.

Parameters:
view_type - Current IViewComponent type that is to be displayed by this swapper.

getHiddenControls

int[] getHiddenControls()
Get the list of control indices hidden by this swapper for the visible IViewComponent. The indices are consistent with the array of ViewControls returned by the IViewComponent.

Returns:
int[] of indices corresponding to controls in the list of ViewControls returned by IViewComponent.getControls(). If no controls are hidden, an empty array (int[0]) is returned. If there is no visible ViewComponent, null is returned.

getVisibleControls

int[] getVisibleControls()
Get the list of control indices shown by this swapper for the Visible IViewComponent. The indices are consistent with the array of ViewControls returned by the IViewComponent.

Returns:
int[] of indices corresponding to controls in the list of ViewControls returned by IViewComponent.getControls(). If no controls exist, an empty array (int[0]) is returned. If there is no visible ViewComponent, null is returned.

setVisibleControls

void setVisibleControls(int display_scheme)
Set the visible controls of the visible IViewComponent based on a predetermined scheme.

Parameters:
display_scheme - Predefined method for choosing visible controls.

setVisibleControls

void setVisibleControls(int[] control_indices)
Set the visible controls of the visible IViewComponent based on a list of control indices. Control indices not included will be hidden. The indices are consistent with the array of ViewControls returned by the IViewComponent.

Parameters:
control_indices - List of indices for choosing visible controls.

getViewComponent

IViewComponent getViewComponent()
This method gets the visible IViewComponent. Use this method to get a complete list of component controls and component menu items. Also, specialized settings for each IViewComponent can be set by upper levels.

Returns:
IViewComponent currently displayed by the IComponentSwapper.

getSwapperMenuItems

ViewMenuItem[] getSwapperMenuItems()
Get ViewMenuItems generated by the class implementing IComponentSwapper. This list should include a ViewMenuItem to swap between IViewComponents.

Returns:
List of ViewMenuItems unique to this IComponentSwapper.

setData

void setData(IVirtualArray iva)
This method sets the data to be displayed by the ComponentSwapper. Since data specific knowledge is needed, the extending ComponentSwapper must provide the implementation.

Parameters:
iva - The data to be displayed by the swapper.

addActionValueListener

void addActionValueListener(ActionValueListener avl)
Add an ActionValueListener to this class which will listen to the events of all IViewComponents contained by this IComponentSwapper.

Parameters:
avl - The ActionValueListener that listens to ActionValueEvents generated by this IComponentSwapper.

removeActionValueListener

void removeActionValueListener(ActionValueListener avl)
Remove an existing ActionValueListener from this class.

Parameters:
avl - The ActionValueListener that listens to ActionValueEvents generated by this IComponentSwapper.

removeAllActionValueListeners

void removeAllActionValueListeners()
Remove all existing ActionValueListeners of this class.
